author: Snazzy Labs
description:
Think you know Apple? Watch as your favorite creators struggle with the company’s most bizarre and secretive rules.
*PLAUD NotePin is the best wearable AI note-taking device I have used to save time and boost efficiency.*

Apple is famous for its pedantic product naming and lingo, but did you know it’s all kept in a lesser-known 243-page rulebook? In this ultimate tech collaboration, @LinusTechTips, @mkbhd, @ScottTheWoz, and Quinn from @snazzy compete to test their knowledge of Apple’s hidden terminology
title: Who Knows Apple’s Lingo Best? Linus, MKBHD, Scott the Woz, or Me?
